product_name: Outdoor Research Sentinel Brim Hat - Unisex
long_description: The Outdoor Research Sentinel Brim hat fends off insects and shades you from harmful solar rays. Treated with EPA-registered Insect Shield(R) to help repel mosquitoes, ticks and other biting insects. Insect Shield(R) is effective through 70 washes. SolarShield(TM) Supplex(R) nylon fabric provides UPF 30 protection against harmful solar rays. Headband is soft next to skin and helps manage moisture. Foam-stiffened brim shades your face and ears, and it floats in water. Mesh side panels add ventilation. Outdoor Research Sentinel Brim hat includes a removable chin cord with cordlock to secure the hat in high winds.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Sentinel Brim hat fends off insects and shades you from harmful solar rays.
